name: TL Bulk Comment Delete
author: Dragoon Apps

sections.description:
Deleting comments one by one can be a pain. Especially when you have a lot of spam or unapproved comments to get rid of. That’s where TL Bulk Delete Comment comes in. This plugin makes deleting comments a breeze, so you can focus on more important things.

With just a few clicks, you can delete all the comments that are cluttering up your blog or website. It’s the perfect way to keep your site looking neat and tidy.

Each action below can delete comments which belong to a respective category.

  • Delete all comments
  • Delete Spam comments
  • Delete Unapproved comments
  • Delete Trash comments
  • Delete unapproved comments of which URL field has a link
  • Delete unapproved comments which contains link in comment
sections.installation:
Just a standard installation required.

  1. Upload tl-bulk-delete-comments.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. TL Bulk Delete Comments is on admin’s sidebar
sections.faq:
Can I restore comments?

No, deleted comments will be gone forever.

short_description: Allows to delete all comments or a certain comments such as unapproved, spam, trash ones.
